attributes.action: There should be a Judicial enquiry into the Iraqi war.
attributes.additional_details: Th chilcot report would be a good base to start from and other evidence gathered from those directly and indirectly involved .
attributes.background:
Following the chilcot report little or no action has been taken in relation to its findings.
The chilcot inquiry remit did not include a judicial remit.
Leaving many unanswered questions in relation to those involved in the decision making .

rejection.details: You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like a judicial inquiry to look into.
